text: 4.13: 1 Ko 14.20; Kor 1.28; 2.2Kha ŋaar, ana mbara muuŋgip ŋgɨp kɨrim, nza zam guigira ndava bavira wari phorgɨp Zisas khothivɨv, nza zam guigira Fhe Bakɨmen Kama kaŋgirga. Nza maaŋ muuŋgip, guma ruma farar muuŋgip, nza guigira Zisas khothɨgap, ana zɨn vui tɨvi, nta Zisas tɨvira fara muuŋgirga.
